name: O R P H E A
name_original: O R P H E A
description:
You are a robot.

After a certain amount of time, you wake up to find the body of your master beside you and your battery damaged. At this moment, all you need to know is that you must enter through the steel doors that stand before you and get to The Core. You will go through a slew of mazes, solves puzzles, and encounter dangerous foes.

 All the while, your battery is slowly draining. You don't have much time. But that doesn't matter now.

 You must continue downwards.

 You need to finish the job the two of you came to accomplish.

Basic Controls:

TO MOVE - Arrow Keys or Clicking on the Mouse 

INTERACTING WITH OBJECTS - Space or Enter

You can also use your playstation controller for this game.

TO MOVE - Joystick

TO INTERACT - 'O'

TO GO BACK - 'X'

IMPORTANT:  Those who are playing on Mac might have trouble saving. Currently the developer is trying to fix the issue. So unfortunately, Mac players will being playing the game as a 'classic mode' game for the time being. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

(ORPHEA was created by Jennifer and Stephanie Cacal)
